verbs.description: surfers chase hurricane waves at alabama point [ARG1: surfers] [V: were] [ARG2: out in force] [ARGM-LOC: at alabama point riding the break] as hurricane michael kicked up big seas in alabama surfing can be a frustrating endeavor with the gulf seldom producing waves big enough to support a full grown person trying to ride atop them on a piece of fiberglass alabama alabama point hurricane michael
